content:
That's a great connection to make! Since you had a positive experience helping with the silent auction at the charity gala, it's wonderful that you're interested in continuing to volunteer in that area.

It's possible that the hospital's silent auction department may have an ongoing need for volunteers, especially if they host multiple events throughout the year. Silent auctions often require a significant amount of planning, organization, and execution, so having dedicated volunteers can be a huge help.

When you reach out to the volunteer department, be sure to mention your specific interest in volunteering in the silent auction department. You can express your enthusiasm for the role and highlight your relevant experience from the charity gala.

Here's an updated example email or phone script:

"Hello [Volunteer Department],

I hope this message finds you well. I had an amazing time volunteering at the charity gala two weeks ago, particularly with the silent auction. I was impressed by the hospital's efforts and would love to continue supporting the silent auction department.

I was wondering if there are any ongoing volunteer opportunities available in the silent auction department. I believe my skills and experience from the gala would be a great fit, and I'd be happy to help with future events.

Could you please let me know if there's a need for volunteers in this area and what the application process would be?

Thank you for your time, and I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best regards,
[Your Name]"

By expressing your specific interest and highlighting your relevant experience, you're more likely to get a positive response from the volunteer department. They may have a need for volunteers in the silent auction department, and you could be a great fit for the role.

Remember to be flexible and open to different opportunities within the silent auction department. They may have varying needs, such as helping with event planning, procurement, setup, or execution. By being flexible, you can increase your chances of finding a volunteer opportunity that suits you and the hospital's needs.
